features: MOISTURIZING CONDITIONER: This lightweight, moisturizing conditioner helps recover hair's natural shine and movement without weighing it down
REPAIR PROTEIN: From the Clean & Pure line of hair products, this hydrating conditioner has an exclusive ProteinFusion blend of elastin protein and marine minerals for smooth and nourished hair
DRY HAIR CONDITIONER WITH QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Essential ingredients purify and revive your hair to recover its natural shine and lock in 24 hours of hydration
DETOXIFYING HAIR CARE: Made with no silicones, dyes or parabens, this hair conditioner provides gentle moisture without heavy build-up and residue
SMOOTHING CONDITIONER: Born in salons and perfected by science, each Nexxus hair product is crafted with proteins extracted from nature’s most precious ingredients to nourish hair
CLEAN AND PURE SHAMPOO AND CONDITIONER: This deep conditioner Nexxus Clean and Pure Conditioner, Nourished Hair Care With ProteinFusion, Silicone-free detoxes hair and locks in moisture
body.description: Want a conditioner that leaves hair deeply nourished, soft, smooth and strong...without the heavy residue some conditioners leave behind? Discover Nexxus Clean & Pure Conditioner. It detoxifies and moisturizes hair while replenishing vital nutrients. Nexxus Clean & Pure hair products are packed with powerful ingredients to purify and revive your hair. Formulated to be silicone, dye and paraben free, this hydrating conditioner is gentle and safe enough to use every day. Salon-crafted with the exclusive ProteinFusion blend of elastin protein and marine minerals, this hair conditioner provides a deep conditioning treatment with benefit of a clean rinse. Great for all hair types, you can unleash your hair’s natural smoothness all day long. This deep conditioner Nexxus Clean and Pure Conditioner, Nourished Hair Care With ProteinFusion, Silicone-free detoxes hair and locks in moisture. Repairing hair can be a multi-step process that includes a combination of hair products. This conditioner works well in concert with Nexxus Clean & Pure Shampoo, Invigorating Detox Scalp Scrub, and Nourishing Detox 5in1 Invisible Hair Oil. For a deep detox, start your hair care routine with Clean & Pure Scalp Scrub to help remove impurities including product and oil build-up. Next, cleanse with Clean & Pure Shampoo. Last, smooth this conditioner onto wet hair and wait three minutes before rinsing thoroughly. Trust your beautiful, healthy hair to the power of Nexxus.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nexxus Clean and Pure Nourishing Detox Conditioner protects the hair fiber, leaving hair smooth and nourished with 0% parabens, dyes or silicones.

The Full Range Complement your conditioner with our Clean and Pure Shampoo and entire Clean and Pure Collection to detox and rebalance your hair. The Experts Nexxus uses the latest trends and technologies to create innovative hair products, like our Clean and Pure Conditioner for nourished hair. Quality Ingredients Nexxus Clean and Pure Collection helps recover shine and movement with an exclusive PROTEINFUSION blend of Elastin Protein and Marine Minerals. Proven Results Nexxus Clean and Pure Conditioner provides salon-quality hair care for smooth, deeply nourished hair.

NEXXUS CLEAN AND PURE NOURISHING DETOX SHAMPOO NEXXUS CLEAN AND PURE SCALP SCRUB NEXXUS CLEAN AND PURE 5-IN-1 INVISIBLE HAIR OIL Main Benefit Nexxus Clean and Pure Nourishing Detox Shampoo cleanses and detoxifies hair while replenishing vital nutrients. Detoxify, purify, and rebalanced your scalp and hair by removing impurities, including product and oil build-up. Nexxus Clean and Pure Nourishing Detox 5-in-1 Invisible Hair Oil provides five benefits in one: nourishment, frizz protection, smoothness, shine and color protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is my favorite conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I started using this conditioner years ago and wasn’t able to find it in stores. I have super curly and thick hair and it adds moister all day. I will never use another conditioner

reviews.reviewText: I saw a vast improvement in my hair on the first use
